openerSection: The IndusInd Bank Celesta Credit Card is a premium credit card providing its cardholders with super-exclusive luxury & lifestyle benefits. The card is issued with a one-time joining fee of Rs. 50,000 and offers vouchers worth Rs. 50K from Oberoi hotels and Montblanc each as a welcome gift. You can make your travels extra luxurious with unlimited complimentary domestic lounge access provided with the card. Coming to its entertainment benefits, one can avail of up to 3 free movie tickets each month & a 20% discount on movies on BookMyShow.

Moreover, it offers exciting offers on dining, including the complimentary Dineout Plus membership, a 25% discount at premium restaurants, and Rs 3,000 off on the dining bill. The card allows you to save in several other ways, like a spend-based waiver on the annual fee, fuel surcharge waiver, etc. To know all the advantages of the IndusInd Bank Celesta Credit Card keep reading the information given below:
andThereIsMore: Get up to 3 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent using your IndusInd Bank Celesta Credit Card.
Reward Points redeemable against Cash credit.
Vouchers worth Rs. 50,000 each from Oberoi Hotels & Montblanc as a welcome gift.
Buy 1 get 1 free (BOGO) offer on movie tickets.
Complimentary golf lessons and golf games every month.

welcomeGifts: Vouchers worth Rs. 50,000 each from Oberoi Hotels & Montblanc as a welcome gift.
rewardsPoints: Get up to 3 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent using your IndusInd Bank Celesta Credit Card.
Reward Points redeemable against Cash credit.

Welcome Benefits: You get either of Oberoi hotels/resorts vouchers worth Rs. 50K or Montblanc vouchers worth Rs. 50,000.
Movie & Dining: Get a 20% discount on movies and buy 1 get 1 free offer (BOGO) on movie tickets through BookMyShow. You get a complimentary Dineout Plus membership.
Rewards Rate: 1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 you spend on domestic purchases. 3 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 you spend on international purchases.
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points are redeemable against a variety of products. You can also redeem these points against AirMiles / Cash credit at a rate of 1 Reward Point = 1 air mile / Re.1.
Golf: 3 complimentary golf games & 3 complimentary golf lessons every month.
Domestic Lounge Access: Enjoy unlimited complimentary access to domestic lounges.
Insurance Benefits: You get insurance coverage for an air accident, lost/delayed baggage, lost passport/ticket, missed connection, etc.
Zero Liability Protection: The cardholder would not be held liable for any unauthorized transactions done on the card if the loss has been reported to the bank within 48 hours.

Spend based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 10 lakhs or more in the last year.
Rewards Redemption Fee: Indusind Bank charges a reward redemption fee of Rs. 100
Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver across all fuel stations.
Cash Advance Charge: 2.5% of the cash withdrawn or Rs. 300 (whichever is higher)
